summary:
WIP of Perc’ahlia’s Big Damn Kiss™
Not quite to the kiss yet, but I’m working on it. I reset my game recently and haven’t...
caption:
WIP of Perc’ahlia’s Big Damn Kiss™
Not quite to the kiss yet, but I’m working on it. I reset my game recently and haven’t seriously filmed in over two years, but I think I’m back to the swing of things.
AUDIO: Critical Role Ep. 72
FILMED WITH: Sims 2

summary: so after mainlining CR campaign 2 for a few weeks, I'm finally current, and hungry for more content.  I went back to watch...
body:
so after mainlining CR campaign 2 for a few weeks, I’m finally current, and hungry for more content. I went back to watch campaign 1 and I just…. dont… like it? Like campaign 2 caught me immediately; I loved all of these characters from the moment they were introduced. As D&D characters, they’re fascinating concepts. They’re well-developed, deep, interesting people. From their first introductions, they struck me as unique individuals that I’d love to learn more about, and they have gotten all the more deep and interesting as the game has gone on, as they’ve interacted with each other and the excellent NPCs and as their backstories have been revealed.

I’m just not getting any of that from Vox. None of the characters are striking me as particularly likable, and several of them are striking me as particularly un-likeable. They all seem kinda flat and archetypal. Part of why I love the Nein is because they’re all disaster people who are being tossed about by forces and events that are much bigger than they are, and they’re just trying to deal. Vox Machina are already established Big Damn Heroes when we met them, and I can’t really bring myself to care about them.

Help me, older CR fans: it gets better, right? I have to assume it must, considering how many people care so strongly about Vox Machina. How many episodes in until it gets really good? How long until I like these people? What is it that draws you to these characters?

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary:
Jester [writing in her diary]: Dear diary, how are you? I’m fine.
Jester:
Jester [groaning and continuing]: Okay, I’m not fine....
body:
Jester [writing in her diary]: Dear diary, how are you? I’m fine.
Jester:
Jester [groaning and continuing]: Okay, I’m not fine. You got me. Gods, you’re good.

summary: “we win. we lose.”  a playlist for the final battle. (or, a playlist of My Emotions in the week between episode 114 and the...
caption:
“we win. we lose.”

a playlist for the final battle. (or, a playlist of My Emotions in the week between episode 114 and the series finale.)

tracklist below the cut.

sleepwalking - live session // this wild life

i’m at the end of the world / where do i go from here / or do i disappear

goodbye to a world // porter robinson

thank you, i’ll say goodbye soon / though it’s the end of the world / don’t blame yourself, now

end of the world // ingrid michaelson

when the sun runs out and there’s no one to save you / will you go to our favorite place and try to say goodbye

way out there // lord huron

there are many more flames when mine is gone / they will build me no shrines and sing me no songs

no more // into the woods original broadway cast

we disappoint, we leave a mess / we die, but we don’t / we disappoint in turn, i guess / forget though we won’t

drink with me // les miserables original london cast

at the shrine of friendship, never say die / let the wine of friendship never run dry / here’s to you / and here’s to me

you are a memory // message to bears

i was calling / for the last time / we’d been here before 

opening // craig armstrong

instrumental

december // wooden arms

so, we’re in this together / and i hope / we’ll come out soon 

home // gabrielle aplin

as long as we’re together / does it matter where we go

saturn // sleeping at last 

i’d give anything to hear / you say it one more time

the story of tonight // hamilton original broadway cast

i may not live to see our glory / but i will gladly join the fight / and when our children tell our story / they’ll tell the story of tonight

the last goodbye // billy boyd

many places i have been / many sorrows i have seen / but i don’t regret / nor will i forget / all who took the road with me

“we win. we lose.”

a playlist for the final battle. (or, a playlist of My Emotions in the week between episode 114 and the series finale.)

tracklist below the cut.

we disappoint, we leave a mess / we die, but we don’t / we disappoint in turn, i guess / forget though we won’t

drink with me // les miserables original london cast

at the shrine of friendship, never say die / let the wine of friendship never run dry / here’s to you / and here’s to me

you are a memory // message to bears

i was calling / for the last time / we’d been here before 

opening // craig armstrong

instrumental

december // wooden arms

so, we’re in this together / and i hope / we’ll come out soon 

home // gabrielle aplin

as long as we’re together / does it matter where we go

saturn // sleeping at last 

i’d give anything to hear / you say it one more time

the story of tonight // hamilton original broadway cast

i may not live to see our glory / but i will gladly join the fight / and when our children tell our story / they’ll tell the story of tonight

the last goodbye // billy boyd

many places i have been / many sorrows i have seen / but i don’t regret / nor will i forget / all who took the road with me
trail.content:
“we win. we lose.”

a playlist for the final battle. (or, a playlist of My Emotions in the week between episode 114 and the series finale.)

tracklist below the cut.

sleepwalking - live session // this wild life

i’m at the end of the world / where do i go from here / or do i disappear

goodbye to a world // porter robinson

thank you, i’ll say goodbye soon / though it’s the end of the world / don’t blame yourself, now

end of the world // ingrid michaelson

when the sun runs out and there’s no one to save you / will you go to our favorite place and try to say goodbye

way out there // lord huron

there are many more flames when mine is gone / they will build me no shrines and sing me no songs

no more // into the woods original broadway cast

we disappoint, we leave a mess / we die, but we don’t / we disappoint in turn, i guess / forget though we won’t

drink with me // les miserables original london cast

at the shrine of friendship, never say die / let the wine of friendship never run dry / here’s to you / and here’s to me

you are a memory // message to bears

i was calling / for the last time / we’d been here before 

opening // craig armstrong

instrumental

december // wooden arms

so, we’re in this together / and i hope / we’ll come out soon 

home // gabrielle aplin

as long as we’re together / does it matter where we go

saturn // sleeping at last 

i’d give anything to hear / you say it one more time

the story of tonight // hamilton original broadway cast

i may not live to see our glory / but i will gladly join the fight / and when our children tell our story / they’ll tell the story of tonight

the last goodbye // billy boyd

many places i have been / many sorrows i have seen / but i don’t regret / nor will i forget / all who took the road with me
trail.content_abstract:
“we win. we lose.”

a playlist for the final battle. (or, a playlist of My Emotions in the week between episode 114 and the series finale.)

tracklist below the cut.

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!
